Articles.Content:
A little bit back, I exited my game to reload some stuff. I deleted the save and made a new one, but, when I loaded it, it was stuck in a camera position looking inbetween the R&D and the VAB. The sun didn't mode and the clock was stuck on Year 1, Day 1, 0 hrs, 0 mins, and I could only click the bottom buttons, which means only Time Warp and exiting the game worked. I deleted and reloaded again, same thing. I didn't install anything in that period of time before it broke. I have no idea what's causing this other than it's affecting my whole game and might be a softlock.

EDIT: Time Warp only works when clicking Warp To Next Morning, and the timer doesn't change.

EDIT2: It works now, like most issues I post on here.

Missed a period. Oops!
Make sure the game is not installed in program files causes issues, create a games folder and load it in there or if your using steam point steam to install in this folder

I have it in documents and I did have it there ever since I got it. I got a few screenshots.

UPDATE: Opened a new save and it works.
